products.name: Lauren Chiffon Midi Dress
products.brandedName: ML Monique Lhuillier Lauren Chiffon Midi Dress
products.description: Introducing the stunning ML Monique Lhuillier Lauren Chiffon Midi Dress, perfect for any special occasion. This beautiful dress from the renowned brand ML Monique Lhuillier challenges the serious stereotype of luxury with its whimsical and playful designs. The Lauren Chiffon Midi Dress features a lovely Floral Shadow print and measures approximately 52.25 inches from shoulder to hem. Made from 100% polyester, this dress is recommended for dry clean only and is imported for the highest quality. Embrace elegance and style with this must-have piece for your wardrobe.

products.name: J. McLaughlin Catalina Cloth Sheath Dress
products.brandedName: J.Mclaughlin Catalina Cloth Sheath Dress
products.description: Introducing the J.McLaughlin Catalina Cloth Sheath Dress, a stunning addition to your wardrobe. This tiered design dress features a classic white and brown color/pattern, making it perfect for any occasion. The dress measures approximately 36 inches from shoulder to hem and is crafted from 91% Nylon and 9% Spandex for a comfortable and flattering fit. The slip-on styling makes it easy to wear, while the hand wash instructions ensure easy care. Whether you're dressing up for a special event or keeping it casual, this dress is a versatile piece that will quickly become a favorite in your closet. Model is 5 feet 10 inches tall and the measurement was taken from a size X-Small, but may vary slightly by size. Imported by J.McLaughlin.

products.name: 2X1 Rib 90's Tank
products.brandedName: Stateside 2X1 Rib 90's Tank
products.description: Introducing the Stateside 2X1 Rib 90's Tank, a classic closet staple made in the USA. This tank top features a wheat color with ribbed fabric and a cropped hem for a stylish look. Measuring approximately 18 inches from shoulder to hem, this tank is perfect for any casual outfit. Constructed from 47% cotton, 47% micro modal, and 6% spandex, this tank is soft, stretchy, and comfortable. Machine washable for easy care, this tank is a versatile addition to your wardrobe. Embrace American-made fashion with the Stateside 2X1 Rib 90's Tank.

products.description: Miuccia Prada has been at the helm of the family’s eponymous label since the 70 s and, in that time, has turned it into an industry powerhouse. Technical fabrics—as seen in the famous Re-Nylon line—alongside androgynous styling and playful proportions keep things feeling fresh, season after season. products.name: Playa Print Maia Dress
products.brandedName: Carolina K. Playa Print Maia Dress
products.description: Argentinian musician and designer Carolina Kleinman created her namesake brand, Carolina K, in 2002. Her collection is eclectic and draws inspiration from her travels in Mexico, Peru, and Bolivia. The Playa Print Maia Dress is a piece of artwork that you can wear. This modern, elegant maxi boasts a fitted ruched bodice, a strapless neckline, and a drop waist with a pleated A-line skirt. Made in collaboration with French artist Henriette Arcelin, the eye-catching pattern is sure to make a statement. Pair with heels and bold jewelry for a graceful event look. Strapless Concealed back zip closure Fitted bodice Ruching along bodice Drop waist Pleating along waist A-line skirt Maxi length Material: 100% Organic Cotton Poplin Care: Dry clean only Made in India
